feature.label: GEMOC TFSM and Activity Language coordination samples
feature.description: Sample operator projects for coordinating TFSM and ActivityDiagram languages(Concurrent). Sample BCOoL operator for GEMOC-based languages, which can be used as examples and reference by specifiers. Install this if you plan to create and coordinate GEMOC-based languages and want to have working examples to study.
